title: Android 13â€™s new clipboard editor overlay rolls out with first beta release
content:
Google rolled out the second Android 13 Developer Preview release for its Pixel devices early last month. The update introduced a couple of user-facing changes and several new features for developers. In addition, it included a couple of hidden features, like a new clipboard popup that helped users easily edit text and images before pasting.

The post Android 13’s new clipboard editor overlay rolls out with first beta release appeared first on XDA.
description: Android 13's new clipboard editor overlay is enabled by default in the first beta release. Here's what it offers.
